description: These oven-baked Garlic Parmesan Fries are the perfect side dish to any burger or sandwich, or just piled high with your favorite toppings!
keywords: Baked Fries, baked potatoes, french fries, garlic parmesan fries, oven baked fries
name: Oven Baked Garlic Parmesan Fries

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 425oF. Wash the potatoes well then cut into 1/2 inch wide fries.
Place the cut fries in a large bowl and add the olive oil, oregano, garlic powder, salt, pepper, and Parmesan. Toss until the fries are coated in oil and seasoning.
Spread the seasoned fries out onto a large baking sheet covered in parchment paper.
Bake the fries for about 30 minutes, or until well browned, stirring once halfway through.
Serve hot! Optional garnish: chopped parsley and a pinch of Parmesan.
